memosearch package¶

Submodules¶

memosearch.db module¶

memosearch.db.close_db(e=None)¶

Close connection if connection is still present We use e to catch errors that cause a teardown.

Parameters:

e – Optional parameter because of close_db bug. Defaults to None

Returns:

None

memosearch.db.get_db()¶

Get the global database connection (sqlite3)

Returns:

global flask database object (g.db)

Return type:

sqlite3.Connection

memosearch.db.init_app(app)¶

Setup teardown and add command to the application cli interface.

Parameters:

app – The flask app to initialize.

Type:

Flask.app

Returns:

None

memosearch.db.init_db()¶

Initialize database and load with schema sql file (schema.sql)

Returns:

None

memosearch.retrieve_blueprints module¶

memosearch.retrieve_blueprints.get_image(id)¶

Handles obtaining the image data from the saved directory when loading screenshot data. This route returns a jpeg image (700, 700) corresponding to the given screenshot id.

Parameters:

id – screenshot id

Type:

int

Returns:

jpeg image file

Return type:

bytes

memosearch.retrieve_blueprints.get_similar_memos(memo)¶

Finds similar memos to the corresponding memo for the given id.

Param:

JSON memo

Type:

JSON

Returns:

List of JSONs/memos that match the given memo.

Return type:

list(JSON)

memosearch.retrieve_blueprints.open_link(id)¶

Returns link information with the given id number. This route returns link information to display for link data.

Parameters:

id – link id

Type:

int

Returns:

JSON representation of what link was saved in database

Return type:

dict (JSON)

memosearch.retrieve_blueprints.open_note(id)¶

Returns note information with the given id number. This route returns note information to display for note data.

Parameters:

id – note id

Type:

int

Returns:

JSON representation of what note was saved in database

Return type:

dict (JSON)

memosearch.retrieve_blueprints.open_screenshot(id)¶

Returns screenshot information with the given id number. This route returns screenshot information to display for screenshot data.

Parameters:

id – screenshot id

Type:

int

Returns:

JSON representation of what screenshot was saved in database

Return type:

dict (JSON)

memosearch.retrieve_blueprints.search()¶

Handles the search route. This route returns all the matching results from the query.

Returns:

JSON representation of what was saved in database

Return type:

list(dict (JSON))

memosearch.retrieve_blueprints.topfive()¶

Returns top five most recent links, notes, and screenshot. This route returns top five items of each content type.

Returns:

JSON with each content type mapped to it’s top five most recent items

Return type:

dict (JSON)

memosearch.retrieve_blueprints.views()¶

Handles the views route.

Returns:

List of strings that represent the views in the database.

Return type:

list(str)

memosearch.upload_blueprints module¶

memosearch.upload_blueprints.delete_link(id)¶

Handles deleting a link with the given link id. This route deletes the link data of the link with the given id.

Parameters:

id – The corresponding id to the link we want to delete.

Type:

int

Returns:

String that shows the successful delete message.

Return type:

str

memosearch.upload_blueprints.delete_note(id)¶

Handles deleting a note with the given note id. This route deletes the note data of the note with the given id.

Parameters:

id – The corresponding id to the note we want to delete.

Type:

int

Returns:

String that shows the successful delete message.

Return type:

str

memosearch.upload_blueprints.delete_screenshot(id)¶

Handles deleting a screenshot with the given screenshot id. This route deletes the screenshot data of the screenshot with the given id.

Parameters:

id – The corresponding id to the screenshot we want to delete.

Type:

int

Returns:

String that shows the successful delete message.

Return type:

str

memosearch.upload_blueprints.links()¶

Handles the link route. GET: This route gets information about the link and returns it in a dictionary. POST: This route adds information about the link and returns the result in a dictionary.

Returns:

JSON representation of what was saved in database

Return type:

list(dict (JSON))

memosearch.upload_blueprints.notes()¶

Handles the note route. GET: This route gets information about the note and returns it in a dictionary. POST: This route adds information about the note and returns the result in a dictionary.

Returns:

JSON representation of what was saved in database

Return type:

list(dict (JSON))

memosearch.upload_blueprints.save_vector(memo, memo_type)¶

Saves the given memo into the vector database with the given id if not yet saved.

Parameters:

  • memo – the memo we want to encode and save

  • memotype – The corresponding memotype (note,ss,link) to the memo we want to encode.

Type:

JSON

Type:

str

Raises:

ValueError – Invalid memo_type option from the below list

Returns:

None

memosearch.upload_blueprints.screenshots()¶

Handles the screenshot route. GET: This route gets information about the screenshot and returns it in a dictionary. POST: This route adds information about the given screenshot and returns the result in a dictionary.

Returns:

JSON representation of what was saved in database

Return type:

list(dict (JSON))

memosearch.upload_blueprints.update_link(id)¶

Handles updating a link with the given link id. This route updates the link data of the link with the given id.

Parameters:

id – The corresponding id to the link we want to update.

Type:

int

Returns:

String that shows the successful update message.

Return type:

str

memosearch.upload_blueprints.update_note(id)¶

Handles updating a note with the given note id. This route updates the note data of the note with the given id.

Parameters:

id – The corresponding id to the note we want to update.

Type:

int

Returns:

String that shows the successful update message.

Return type:

str

memosearch.upload_blueprints.update_screenshot(id)¶

Handles updating a screenshot with the given screenshot id. This route updates the screenshot data of the screenshot with the given id.

Parameters:

id – The corresponding id to the screenshot we want to update.

Type:

int

Returns:

String that shows the successful update message.

Return type:
